mapper.select: SELECT spot_id, longitude, latitude, spot_name, realtime_people, suggested_people FROM tb_spot ORDER BY longitude ASC, latitude ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_spot(spot_name, longitude, latitude, suggested_people) VALUES (#{spotName}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{suggestedPeople})
INSERT INTO tb_user_location(user_id, spot_id, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{spotId}, now()); UPDATE tb_spot SET realtime_people = realtime_people+1 WHERE spot_id = #{spotId};
